enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating or managing collections, which are central to the functionality of the put method.
The put method relies on retrieving existing collections, making getCollection a natural precursor.
The putAll method is a bulk operation that can be tested in conjunction with the put method to ensure proper handling of multiple values.
Testing the put method should include scenarios where values are added and then removed, making removeMapping a relevant method to test in sequence.
